businesses.description: AnythingWeather Communications™, Inc. (AW) has spent 10 years building custom weather services and applications utilizing an arsenal of weather data collected from thousands of sources. AW utilizes this vast resource of data to deliver unique and targeted services with an extremely personal touch.</br>AW is operated by meteorologists and developers with extensive experience in the private weather industry. Our business revolves around creating new services using the latest technology, mostly in a Web 2.0 environment. By listening closely to our client’s business strategy, we build custom solutions to increase the bottom line.</br>AW offers exclusive services to various industries, including:    HailWatch storm reporting and marketing services to roofing, dent repair and insurance agencies. Details are available at hailwatch.com.  Weather station and webcam network consultation, development, installation and operation for government and business. AW also developed and sells an exclusive industrial strength weather station and webcam combo package called the AnythingWeather System™. Weather data collection, archival, display and dissemination from individuals, businesses and government agencies. On-line weather merchandise targeted at Skywarn storm spotters, storm chasers and weather enthusiasts. Our on-line store is available at AnythingWeatherStore.com.   Severe weather alerting services based on severe thunderstorms, tornadoes, flash floods, lightning, winter storms, and even specific weather variables like extreme heat or cold or maximum wind gusts. More details are available at SevereAlerts.com.
See website for customer service centers in your area.

Rigid Lifelines™ is a leader in fall protection solutions for miners who are exposed to fall hazards.  With access to a variety of customized permanent and portable solutions from rooftops to confined spaces, Rigid Lifelines can address the needs of any worker, anywhere.  Whether you’re maintaining your vehicles or accessing equipment, Rigid Lifelines has you covered.

businesses.contact: Allen Stowers, Mike Brown, Roger Thaxton Jr. or Peggy Fields
businesses.description: Stowers is a full service ANSUL Distributor.  We’ve been meeting the fire protection needs of the coal industry since 1958.  We provide our customers with the very best quality of installation, maintenance, recharges, and training of ANSUL Extinguishers and Fire Suppression Systems.  We also offer First Aid box inspections and refills for unit-sized boxes to the large miner stations.  We sell MSHA approved fire hose, fire nozzles, adaptors, and fittings.
Strata Worldwide, LLC is a global leader in mine safety products and technologies that promote a safer, more productive working environment above and below ground.
